title: UFO Robo Grendizer tai Great Mazinger
synopsis: Alien invaders take over Great Mazinger who is at the entrance of a museum next to Mazinger Z as symbols of peace. Grendizer fights the evil invaders and Great Mazinger is recovered.
staff: [['Kasai, Osamu', ['Episode Director']], ['Fujikawa, Keisuke', ['Script', ' Screenplay']], ["Koorogi '73", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Nagai, Go', ['Original Creator']]]
